GV03sb_14_u:0: om devā ha vai sattraṃ niṣeduḥ agnirindraḥ somo makho viṣṇurviśve devā
GV03sb_14_u:2: teṣām kurukṣetram devayajanamāsa tasmādāhuḥ kurukṣetram devānāṃ
GV03sb_14_u:3: devayajanamiti tasmādyatra kva ca kurukṣetrasya nigacati tadeva manyata idam
GV03sb_14_u:5: ta āsata śriyaṃ gacema yaśaḥ syāmānnādāḥ syāmeti tatho eveme sattramāsate śriyaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:7: te hocuḥ yo naḥ śrameṇa tapasā śraddhayā yaiñenāhutibhiryajñasyodṛcam
GV03sb_14_u:8: pūrvo'vagacātsa naḥ śreṣṭho'sattadu naḥ sarveṣāṃ saheti tatheti 14.1.1.[5]
GV03sb_14_u:9: tadviṣṇuḥ prathamaḥ prāpa sa devānāṃ śreṣṭho'bhavattasmādāhurviṣṇurdevānāṃ
GV03sb_14_u:11: sa yaḥ sa viṣṇuryajñaḥ sa sa yaḥ sa yajño'sau sa ādityastaddhedaṃ yaśo viṣnurna
GV03sb_14_u:12: śaśāka saṃyantu tadidamapyetarhi naiva sarva-iva yaśaḥ śaknoti saṃyantum 14.1.1.[7]
GV03sb_14_u:13: sa tisṛdhanvamādāyāpacakrāma sa dhanurārtnyā śira upastabhya tasthau tam devā
GV03sb_14_u:15: tā ha vamrya ūcuḥ imā vai vamryo yadupadīkā yo'sya jyāmapyadyātkimasmai
GV03sb_14_u:22: te devā abruvan mahānbata no vīro'dādīti tasmānmahāvīrastasya yo raso
GV03sb_14_u:24: tam devā abhyamṛjyanta yathā vittim vetsyamānā evam tamindraḥ prathamaḥ prāpa
GV03sb_14_u:26: yaśo'bhavadyadidamindro yaśo yaśo ha bhavati ya evam veda 14.1.1.[13]
GV03sb_14_u:27: sa u eva makhaḥ sa viṣṇuḥ tata indro makhavānabhavanmakhavānha vai tam
GV03sb_14_u:29: tābhyo vamrībhyo'nnādyam prāyacan āpo vai sarvamannaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:31: athemam viṣṇuṃ yajñam tredhā vyabhajanta vasavaḥ prātaḥsavanaṃ rudrā
GV03sb_14_u:33: agniḥ prātaḥsavanam indro mādhyandinaṃ savanam viśve devāstṛtīyasavanam 14.1.1.[17]
GV03sb_14_u:34: gāyatrī prataḥsavanam triṣṭummādhyandinaṃ savanaṃ jagatī tṛtīyasavanaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:36: dadhyaṅ ha vā ātharvaṇaḥ etaṃ śukrametaṃ yajñam vidāṃ cakāra
GV03sb_14_u:37: yathā-yathaitadyajñasya śiraḥ pratidhīyate yathaiṣa kṛtsno yajño bhavati 14.1.1.[19]
GV03sb_14_u:38: sa hendreṇokta āsa etam cedanyasmā anubrūyāstata eva te śiraścindyāmiti 14.1.1.[20]
GV03sb_14_u:39: tadu hāśvinoranuśrutamāsa dadhyaṅṅu ha vā ātharvaṇa etaṃ śukrametaṃ yajñam
GV03sb_14_u:40: veda yathāyathaitadyajñasya śiraḥ pratidhīyate yathaiṣa kṛtsno yajño bhavati 14.1.1.[21]
GV03sb_14_u:41: tau hetyocatuḥ upa tvāyāveti kimanuvakṣyamāṇāvityetaṃ śukrametaṃ yajñam
GV03sb_14_u:42: yathā-yathaitadyajñasya śiraḥ pratidhīyate yathaiṣa kṛtsno yajño bhavatīti 14.1.1.[22]
GV03sb_14_u:43: sa hovāca indreṇa vā ukto'smyetaṃ cedanyasmā anubrūyāstata eva te śiraścindyāmiti
GV03sb_14_u:44: tasmādvai bibhemi yadvai me sa śiro na cindyānna vāmupaneṣya iti 14.1.1.[23]
GV03sb_14_u:45: tau hocatuḥ āvām tvā tasmāttrāsyāvaha iti katham mā trāsyethe iti yadā nā
GV03sb_14_u:46: upaneṣyase'tha te śiraścittvānyatrāpanidhāsyāvo'thāśvasya śira āhṛtya tatte
GV03sb_14_u:47: pratidhāsyāvastena nāvanuvakṣyasi sa yadā nāvanuvakṣyasyatha te śiraścetsyatyatha
GV03sb_14_u:48: te svaṃ śira āhṛtya tatte pratidhāsyāva iti tatheti 14.1.1.[24]
GV03sb_14_u:49: tau hopaninye tau yadopaninye'thāsya śiraścittvānyatrāpanidadhaturathāśvasya śira
GV03sb_14_u:50: āhṛtya taddhāsya pratidadhatustena hābhyāmanūvāca sa yadābhyāmanūvācāthāsya
GV03sb_14_u:51: tadindraḥ śiraścicedāthāsya svaṃ śira āhṛtya taddhāsya pratidadhatuḥ 14.1.1.[25]
GV03sb_14_u:52: tasmādetadṛṣiṇābhyanūktam dadhyaṅ ha yanmadhvātharvaṇo vāmaśvasya śīrṣṇā pra
GV03sb_14_u:54: tanna sarvasmā anubrūyāt enasyaṃ hi tadatho nenma indraḥ śiraścinadaditi yo nveva
GV03sb_14_u:55: jñātastasmai brūyādatha yo'nūcāno'tha yo'sya priyaḥ syānna tveva sarvasmā iva 14.1.1.[27]
GV03sb_14_u:56: samvatsaravāsine'nubrūyāt eṣa vai samvatsaro ya eṣa tapatyeṣa u
GV03sb_14_u:58: tisro rātrīrvrataṃ carati trayo vā ṛtavaḥ samvatsarasya samvatsara eṣa ya eṣa
GV03sb_14_u:59: tapatyeṣa u pravargyastadetamevaitatprīṇāti tasmāttisro rātrīrvrataṃ carati 14.1.1.[29]
GV03sb_14_u:61: amṛnmayapāyī asti vā asyāṃ saṃsṛṣṭamiva yadasyāmanṛtam vadati
GV03sb_14_u:63: aśūdrociṣṭī eṣa vai dharmo ya eṣa tapati saiṣā śrīḥ satyaṃ jyotiranṛtaṃ strī śūdraḥ
GV03sb_14_u:64: śvā kṛṣṇaḥ śakunistāni na prekṣeta necriyaṃ ca pāpmānaṃ ca nejjyotiśca tamaśca
GV03sb_14_u:66: athaiṣa vāva yaśaḥ ya eṣa tapati tadyattadādityo yaśo yajño haiva
GV03sb_14_u:67: tadyaśastadyattadyajño yaśo yajamāno haiva tadyaśastadyattadyajamāno yaśa ṛtvijo
GV03sb_14_u:68: haiva tadyaśastadyattadṛtvijo yaśo dakṣiṇā haiva tadyaśastasmādyāmasmai
GV03sb_14_u:70: āgaṃstatsadyo'nyasmā atidiśānīti śvo vaiva bhūte dvyahe vā tadātmanyevaitadyaśaḥ
GV03sb_14_u:71: kṛtvā yadeva tadbhavati tatsa dadāti hiraṇyaṃ gām vāso'śvam vā 14.1.1.[33]
GV03sb_14_u:72: athaitadvā āyuretajjyotiḥ praviśati ya etamanu vā brūtebhakṣayati vā tasya
GV03sb_14_u:76: rātrāvaśnīyāttadetadasya rūpaṃ kriyate ya eṣa tapati tadu hovācāsurirekaṃ ha vai
GV03sb_14_u:77: devā vrataṃ caranti yatsatyam tasmādu satyameva vadet 14.1.2.[1]
GV03sb_14_u:78: sa vai sambhārāntsambharati sa yadvā enānitthāccetthācca sambharati
GV03sb_14_u:79: tatsambhārāṇāṃ sambhāratvaṃ sa vai yatra-yatra yajñasya nyaktaṃ tatastataḥ
GV03sb_14_u:81: kṛṣṇājinaṃ sambharati yajño vai kṛṣṇajinaṃ yajña evainametatsambharati
GV03sb_14_u:82: lomataścandāṃsi vai lomāni candaḥsvevainametatsambharatyuttarata udīcī hi
GV03sb_14_u:84: abhryā vajro vā abhrirvīryam vai vajro vīryeṇaivainametatsamardhayati kṛtsnaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:86: audumbarī bhavati ūrgvai rasa udumbara ūrjaivainametadrasena samardhayati
GV03sb_14_u:88: atho vaikaṅkatī prajāpatiryām prathamāmāhutimajuhotsa hutvā yatra nyamṛṣṭa tato
GV03sb_14_u:91: aratnimātrī bhavati bāhurvā aratnirbāhuno vai vīryaṃ kriyate vīryasammitaiva
GV03sb_14_u:93: tāmādatte devasya tvā savituḥ prasave'śvinorbāhubhyām pūṣṇo hastābhyāmādade
GV03sb_14_u:95: tāṃ savye pāṇau kṛtvā dakṣiṇenābhimṛśya japati yuñjate mana uta yuñjate dhiyo
GV03sb_14_u:96: viprā viprasya bṛhato vipaścitaḥ vi hotrā dadhe vayunāvideka inmahī devasya
GV03sb_14_u:98: atha mṛtpiṇḍam pavrigṛhṇāti abhryā ca dakṣiṇato hastena ca hastenaivottarato devī
GV03sb_14_u:99: dyāvāpṛthivī iti yajñasya śīrṣacinnasya raso vyakṣaratsa ime dyāvāpṛthivī
GV03sb_14_u:100: agacadyanmṛdiyaṃ tadyadāpo'sau tanmṛdaścāpāṃ ca mahāvīrāḥ kṛtā bhavanti
GV03sb_14_u:101: tenaivainametadrasena samardhayati kṛtsnaṃ karoti tasmādāha devī dyāvāpṛthivī iti
GV03sb_14_u:102: makhasya vāmadya śiro rādhyāsamiti yajño vai makho yajñasya vāmadya śiro
GV03sb_14_u:103: rādhyāsamityevaitadāha devayajane pṛthivyā iti devayajane hi pṛthivyai sambharati
GV03sb_14_u:104: makhāya tvā makhasya tvā śīrṣṇa iti yajño vai makho yajñāya tvā yajñasya tvā
GV03sb_14_u:106: atha valmīkavapām devyo vamrya ityetā vā etadakurvata yathā-yathaitadyajñasya
GV03sb_14_u:107: śiro'cidyata tābhirevainametatsamardhayati kṛtsnaṃ karoti bhūtasya prathamajā
GV03sb_14_u:108: itīyam vai pṛthivī bhūtasya prathamajā tadanayaivainametatsamardhayati kṛtsnaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:109: karoti makhasya vo'dya śiro rādhyāsaṃ devayajane pṛthivyā makhāya tvā makhasya
GV03sb_14_u:111: atha varāhavihatam iyatyagra āsīditīyatī ha vā iyamagre pṛthivyāsa prādeśamātrī
GV03sb_14_u:112: tāmemūṣa iti varāha ujjaghāna so'syāḥ patiḥ prajāpatistenaivainametanmithunena
GV03sb_14_u:113: priyeṇa dhāmnā samardhayati kṛtsnaṃ karoti makhasya te'dya śiro rādhyāsaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:114: devayajane pṛthivyā makhāya tvā makhasya tvā śīrṣṇa ityasāveva bandhuḥ 14.1.2.[12]
GV03sb_14_u:115: athādārān indrasyauja stheti yatra vā enamindra ojasā paryagṛhṇāttadasya
GV03sb_14_u:116: parigṛhītasya raso vyakṣaratsa pūyannivāśeta so'bravīdādīryeva bata ma eṣa
GV03sb_14_u:118: tasmātpūtīkāstasmādagnāvāhutirivābhyāhitā jvalanti tasmādu surabhayo yajñasya hi
GV03sb_14_u:119: rasātsambhūtā atha yadenaṃ tadindra ojasā paryagṛhṇāttasmādāhendrasyauja stheti
GV03sb_14_u:120: makhasya vo'dya śiro rādhyāsaṃ devayajane pṛthivyā makhāya tvā makhasya tvā
GV03sb_14_u:123: samabhavattayaivainametacucā samardhayati kṛtsnaṃ karoti makhāya tvā makhasya
GV03sb_14_u:125: tānvā etānpañca sambhārānsambharati pāṅkto yajñaḥ pāṅktaḥ paśuḥ pañcartavaḥ
GV03sb_14_u:126: samvatsarasya samvatsara eṣa ya eṣa tapatyeṣa u pravargyastadetamevaitatprīṇāti
GV03sb_14_u:127: tāntsambhṛtānabhimṛśati makhāya tvā makhasya tvā śīrṣṇa ityasāveva bandhuḥ 14.1.2.[15]
GV03sb_14_u:128: athottarataḥ pariśritam bhavati tadabhiprayanto japanti praitu brahmaṇaspatirityeṣa
GV03sb_14_u:129: vai brahmaṇaspatirya eṣa tapatyeṣa u pravargyastadetamevaitatprīṇāti tasmādāha
GV03sb_14_u:130: praitu brahmaṇaspatiriti pradevyetu sūnṛteti devī hyeṣā sūnṛtācā vīraṃ naryam
GV03sb_14_u:133: pariśritam bhavati etadvai devā abibhayuryadvai na imamiha rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā na
GV03sb_14_u:134: hanyuriti tasmā etām puram paryaśrayaṃstathaivāsmā ayametām puram pariṣrayati 14.1.2.[17]
GV03sb_14_u:135: atha khare sādayati makhāya tvā makhasya tvā śīrṣṇa ityasāveva bandhuratha
GV03sb_14_u:136: mṛtpiṇḍamapādāya mahāvīraṃ karoti makhāya tvā makhasya tvā śīrṣṇa ityasāveva
GV03sb_14_u:137: bandhuḥ prādeśamātram prādeśamātramiva hi śiro madhye saṅgṛhītam madhye
GV03sb_14_u:139: nāsikāmevāsminnetaddadhāti taṃ niṣṭhitamabhimṛśati makhasya śiro'sīti makhasya
GV03sb_14_u:140: hyetatsaumyasya śira evamitarau tūṣṇīm pinvane tūṣṇīṃ rauhiṇakapāle 14.1.2.[18]
GV03sb_14_u:141: prajāpatirvā eṣa yajño bhavati ubhayam vā etatprajāpatirniruktaścāniruktaśca
GV03sb_14_u:142: parimitaścāparimitaśca tadyadyajuṣā karoti yadevāsya niruktam parimitaṃ rūpaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:143: tadasya tena saṃskarotyatha yattūṣṇīṃ yadevāsyāniruktamaparimitaṃ rūpaṃ tadasya
GV03sb_14_u:144: tena saṃskaroti sa ha vā etaṃ sarvaṃ kṛtsnam prajāpatiṃ saṃskaroti ya evam
GV03sb_14_u:146: atha gavedhukābhirhinvati yajñasya śīrṣacinnasya raso vyakṣarattata etā oṣadhayo
GV03sb_14_u:147: jajñire tenaivainametadrasena samardhayati kṛtsnaṃ karoti makhāya tvā makhasya
GV03sb_14_u:148: tvā śīrṣṇa ityasāveva bandhurevamitarau tūṣṇīm pinvane tūṣṇīṃ rauhiṇakapāle 14.1.2.[20]
GV03sb_14_u:149: athaināndhūpayati aśvasya tvā vṛṣṇaḥ śaknā dhūpayāmīti vṛṣā vā aśvo vīryam vai
GV03sb_14_u:150: vṛṣā vīryeṇaivainametatsamardhayati kṛtsnaṃ karoti devayajane pṛthivyā makhāya
GV03sb_14_u:151: tvā makhasya tvā śīrṣṇa ityasāveva bandhurevamitarau tūṣṇīm pinvane tūṣnīṃ
GV03sb_14_u:153: athaināñcrapayati śṛtaṃ hi devānāmiṣṭkābhiḥ śrapayatyeta vā etadakurvata
GV03sb_14_u:155: tadu yenaiva suśṛtāḥ syustena śrapayedatha pacanamavadhāya mahāvīramavadadhāti
GV03sb_14_u:156: makhāya tvā makhasya tvā śīrṣṇa ityasāveva bandhurevamitarau tūṣṇīm pinvane
GV03sb_14_u:158: sa udvapati ṛjave tvetyasau vai loka ṛjuḥ satyaṃ hyṛjuḥ satyameṣa ya eṣa tavpatyeṣa
GV03sb_14_u:160: sādhave tveti ayam vai sādhuryo'yam pavata eṣa hīmāṃlokāntsiddho'nupavata eṣa
GV03sb_14_u:161: u dvitīyaḥ pravargyastadetamevaitatprīṇāti tasmādāha sādhave tveti 14.1.2.[24]
GV03sb_14_u:162: sukṣityai tveti ayam vai lokaḥ sukṣitirasminhi loke sarvāṇi bhūtāni kṣiyantyatho
GV03sb_14_u:163: agnirvai sukṣitiragnirhyevāsmiṃloke sarvāṇi bhūtāni kṣiyatyeṣa u tṛtīyaḥ
GV03sb_14_u:164: pravargyastadetamevaitatprīṇāti tasmādāha sukṣityai tveti tūṣṇīm pinvane tūṣṇīṃ
GV03sb_14_u:166: athainānācṛṇatti ajāyai payasā makhāya tvā makhasya tvā śīrṣṇa ityasāveva
GV03sb_14_u:168: athaitadvai āyuretajjyotiḥ praviśati ya etamanu vā brūte bhakṣayati vā tasya
GV03sb_14_u:170: sa yadaitadātithyena pracarati atha pravargyeṇa cariṣyanpuropasado'greṇa
GV03sb_14_u:172: mahāvīram parīṣāsau pinvane rauhiṇakapāle rauhiṇahavanyau srucau yadu
GV03sb_14_u:175: vīryam yadā vai dvau saṃrabhete atha tau vīryaṃ kuruto dvandvam vai mithunam
GV03sb_14_u:178: hotarabhiṣṭuhīti brahmā vai yajñasya dakṣiṇata āste'bhigoptā
GV03sb_14_u:179: tamevaitadāhāpramatta āssva yajñasya śiraḥ pratidhāsyāma iti hotarabhiṣṭuhīti yajño
GV03sb_14_u:180: vai hotā tamevaitadāha yajñasya śiraḥ pratidhehīti pratipadyate hotā 14.1.3.[3]
GV03sb_14_u:181: brahma jajñānam prathamam purastāditi asau vā ādityo brahmāharahaḥ
GV03sb_14_u:182: purastājjāyata eṣa u pravargyastadetamevaitatprīṇāti tasmādāha brahma jajñānam
GV03sb_14_u:184: sa prokṣati yamāya tvetyeṣa vai yamo ya eṣa tapatyeṣa hīdaṃ sarvaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:185: yamayatyetenedaṃ sarvaṃ yatameṣa u pravargyastadetamevaitatprīṇāti tasmādāha
GV03sb_14_u:187: makhāya tveti eṣa vai makho ya eṣa tapatyeṣa u pravargyastadetamevaitatprīṇāti
GV03sb_14_u:189: sūryasya tvā tapasa iti eṣa vai sūryo ya eṣa tapatyeṣa
GV03sb_14_u:190: pravargyastadetamevaitatprīṇāti tasmādāha sūryasya tvā tapasa iti 14.1.3.[7]
GV03sb_14_u:191: pūrvayā dvārā sthūṇāṃ nirhṛtya dakṣiṇato niminvanti yathaināṃ
GV03sb_14_u:192: hotābhiṣṭuvanparāpaśyedyajño vai hotā sa evāsyāmetadyajñam pratidadhāti tathaiṣā
GV03sb_14_u:196: audumbarī bhavati ūrgvai rasa udumbara ūrjaivainametadrasena samardhayati
GV03sb_14_u:198: aṃsadaghnā bhavati aṃsayorvā idaṃ śiraḥ pratiṣthitam tadaṃsayorevaitaciraḥ
GV03sb_14_u:200: bālvajībhī rajjubhirvyutā bhavati yajñasya śīrṣacinnasya raso vyakṣarattata etā
GV03sb_14_u:201: oṣadhayo jajñire tenaivainametadrasena samardhayati kṛtsnam karoti 14.1.3.[12]
GV03sb_14_u:202: atha yaduttarata āsādayati yajño vai somaḥ śiraḥ pravargya uttaram vai
GV03sb_14_u:203: śirastasmāduttarata āsādayatyatho rājā vai somaḥ samrāṭ pravargya uttaram vai
GV03sb_14_u:205: sa yatraitāṃ hotānvāha añjanti yam prathayanto na viprā iti tadetam pracaraṇīyam
GV03sb_14_u:206: mahāvīramājyena samanakti devastvā savitā madhvānaktviti savitā vai devānām
GV03sb_14_u:207: prasavitā sarvamvā idam madhu yadidaṃ kiṃ ca tadenamanena sarveṇa samanakti
GV03sb_14_u:208: tadasmai savitā prasavitā prasauti tasmādāha devastvā savitā madhvānaktviti 14.1.3.[14]
GV03sb_14_u:209: athottarataḥ sikatā upakīrṇā bhavanti tadrajatam hiraṇyamadhastādupāsyati pṛthivyāḥ
GV03sb_14_u:210: saṃspṛśaspāhītyetadvai devā abibhayuryadvai na imamadhastādrakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā na
GV03sb_14_u:211: hanyurityagnervā etadreto yaddhiraṇyaṃ nāṣṭrāṇāṃ rakṣasāmapahatyā atho pṛthivyu
GV03sb_14_u:212: ha vā etasmādbibhayāṃ cakāra yadvai māyaṃ taptaḥ śuśucāno na hiṃsyāditi tadevāsyā
GV03sb_14_u:213: etadantardadhāti rajatam bhavati rajataiva hīyam pṛthivī 14.1.3.[15]
GV03sb_14_u:214: sa yatraitāṃ hotānvāha saṃsīdasva mahām mahām asīti tadubhayata ādīptā
GV03sb_14_u:215: mauñjāḥ pralavā bhavanti tānupāsya teṣu pravṛṇakti yajñasya śīrṣacinnasya raso
GV03sb_14_u:216: vyakṣarattata etā oṣadhayo jajñire tenaivainametadrasena samardhayati kṛtsnaṃ
GV03sb_14_u:218: atha yadubhayata ādīptā bhavanti sarvābhya evaitaddigbhyo rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā
